narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 11-year-old female was last seen at Falls Church at 2025-10-03T21:56:40.300959+00:00. The child was reported missing by teacher after failing to arrive at school.

narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 10 hours of disappearance, movement cues merged onto I-64 west toward Richmond suggest travel east toward Tidewater along I-264. A silver 2018 Nissan Altima was observed departing near Falls Church, Virginia.

provenance._fulltext: A 11-year-old female was last seen at Falls Church at 2025-10-03T21:56:40.300959+00:00. The child was reported missing by teacher after failing to arrive at school. Within 10 hours of disappearance, movement cues merged onto I-64 west toward Richmond suggest travel east toward Tidewater along I-264. A silver 2018 Nissan Altima was observed departing near Falls Church, Virginia. Around 1 hours later, a store_employee reported someone matching the description (11-year-old female, wearing denim jacket, gray shorts, black sneakers) near Albemarle.
